entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishTrimmed should respect PublishSelfContained #32272
  • GenAPI IncludeVisibleOutsideOfAssembly --include-visible-outside is misnamed #32258
  • dotnet 7.0.4 (iOS): NullReferenceException in Socket-related code (originating from Http2Connection disposal) #32245

Closed

  • I get error NU1202 when I try to build the SDK on my local machine #31856

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in Directory.Build.props #32259
    untriaged

Merged

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.0 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.1 to 19.14.1 in /eng/dependabot #32208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #32225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #32194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Change where to get latest .gitignore from #31965
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
